subject: Automobiles
Automobile Racing
lead_paragraph: Robert I. Kauffman, president and a founding partner of Fortress Investment Group, has bought a 50 percent interest in Michael Waltrip Racing in the latest unusual coupling in Nascar.
snippet: Robert I. Kauffman, president and a founding partner of Fortress Investment Group, has bought a 50 percent interest in Michael Waltrip Racing in the latest unusual coupling in Nascar.
